CommunicationChannelPurpose.description: Communication purpose of the channel. Possible values: Alerts, PrivacyNotices, NegativeBalance, OverdraftProtection, ACHNotice, ChargeBack, BalanceOnReceipt, RegulationCCNotice, RateChange, MaturityNotice, InterestNotice, RegularNotice, PastDueNotice, HUDNotice, PaymentChange, AutomaticPayment, PastDueFirstNotice, PastDueSecondNotice, PastDueNoticeGuarantor, ElectronicStatement.
